Title: OMG: Oh My God!
Writer: Alok Jha, Saumya Joshi (story), Bhavesh Mandalia (screenplay and dialogue), Pranay Vivek Patil, Umesh Shukla (screenplay)
Actors: Paresh Rawal, Akshay Kumar, Mithun Chakraborty, Mahesh Manjrekar
Plot: A shopkeeper takes God to court when his shop is destroyed by an earthquake.
Production: Grazing Goat Pictures, Viacom 18 Motion Pictures, Playtime
